claims.claim: Activism and organizing work is most effective when driven by personal frustration and anger.
claims.quote: in organizing work when you're mad and pissed off at things that aren't happening, right? That's when you're doing your work best.

claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals can channel their frustrations into activism and organizing.
claims.quote: That's when you're doing your work best. Right. So think about those people who are shouting from their lungs or using signs [...] Can't you see employing these people who are having a hard time getting a job?

claims.claim: Mismanagement of one's energy and power can lead to re-incarceration.
claims.quote: , it's mismanaged and it's used in a way that gets them put back in the system.
